name: eCommerce Addon
author: NicheAddons

sections.description:
eCommerce Addon covers all the must-needed elements for creating a perfect eCommerce website using Elementor Page Builder. 20+ Unique & Basic Elementor widget covers all of the eCommerce elements.

All Elements List

Demo eCommerce Websites

Furniture Shop Demo
Accessories Shop Demo
Fashion Shop Demo
Graphic Elements – Digital Shop Demo

20+ eCommerce Website Widgets

Each elementor widget crafted based on eCommerce Websites in Mind. So, this plugin covers all 20+ free must-needed elementor widgets to fulfill your ecommerce website needs. At the same time, it grabs your visitor’s attention. ðŸ™‚

Easy to Customize

User-Friendly wise Elementor is the best choice of Page Builder in WordPress. We assured that same editing experience in our Addons plugin too. Every widget comes with plenty of options with easy to edit user experience.

Professional Support

Our experienced Team supports your every question carefully, and your points/notes will take to the core development team to improving our plugin gradually.

20+ eCommerce Free Widgets & Counting

You can find all of the following 20+ most useful widgets of your Awesome eCommerce Website.

All elements list: Elements List

Basic Widgets

  1. Banner – Three Styles, Title, Description, Button, Link, Product Image, Back Text, Slider Controls
  2. Blog – Post Limit, Order, OrderBy, Category Limit, Stylings
  3. Progress Bar – Numeric Value, Title, Stylings
  4. Client – Group, Image Uploads, Link, Stylings
  5. Counter – Two Styles, Icon, Heading, Description, and Stylings
  6. Coupon – Image, Title, Description, Button, Coupon Code, Stylings
  7. Icon Box – Three Styles, Icon, Heading, Description, and Stylings
  8. Offer – Three Styles, Image, Heading, Description, Counter, Link, Animation, and Stylings
  9. Tab – Two Styles, Title, Sub-Title, Description, Image, and Stylings
  10. Pricing – Three Styles, Title, Sub-Title, and Stylings
  11. Subscribe Form – Two Styles, Title, Sub-Title, Description, and Stylings
  12. Team – Two Styles, Title, Profession, Image, Social Links, and Stylings
  13. Testimonials – Three Styles, Title, Profession, Image, Description, and Stylings
  14. Video – Video URL, Icon, Animation, and Stylings

WooCommerce Widgets

  1. Categories – Two Styles, Title, Description, Categories Listing Control and Stylings
  2. Products – Two Styles, Limits, Order, OrderBy, Specific Category, and Stylings
  3. Product Slider – Two Styles, Limits, Order, OrderBy, Specific Category, and Stylings

Easy Digital Downloads Widgets

  1. Categories – Two Styles, Title, Description, Categories Listing Control and Stylings
  2. Products – Two Styles, Limits, Order, OrderBy, Specific Category, and Stylings
  3. Product Slider – Two Styles, Limits, Order, OrderBy, Specific Category, and Stylings

PRO Widgets

  1. Compare Products – Two Styles, Select Product, Attributes, Metas.
  2. Deals Countdown – Two Styles, Select Product, Timer, Styles.
  3. Image Hotspot – Select Images, Select Positions, Select Products for Position, Metas to Show/Hide.
  4. Products Masonry Listing – Two Styles, Masonry, Metas to Show/Hide, Additional Styles.
  5. Full-Screen Scroll – Select Styles, Select Products, Additional Settings.
  6. Slider – Carousel – Select Styles, Products, Listings, Additional Settings.
  7. Products Listing – Select Styles, Products, Listings, Additional Settings.
  8. Banner – Two Styles, Slider Settings, Products, Additional Settings.
  9. Cart – Two Styles, Elementor Pro Custom Header Supports, Additional Settings.
  10. Free Shipping – Top Bar Free Shipping Slider, Set a Basic Amount for Starting Free Shipping on your Website. It’ll Encourage Customers to Buy More Products for Getting a Free Shipping Delivery.
sections.installation:
• Make sure you already have a WordPress site and the Elementor plugin installed and activated.

Default Installation

  1. Install “eCommerce Addon” via WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Once installed, Activate “eCommerce Addon.”

Manual Installation

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
This plugin work with any theme?

Yes, for sure! It will work with any theme that “Elementor Page Builder” works.

Is this plugin work without Elementor Page Builder?

No, it’ll not work without Elementor Page Builder, it’s an addon for Elementor.
